anya-e0104n11:2_2: ayampī”ti anupadadassanavasena vitthārato pakāsetuṁ na sukaraṁ atibahubhāvato.
anya-e0104n11:2_4: Nānākilesaviddhaṁsananti sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchādivasena nānāvidhānaṁ kilesadhammānaṁ tadaṅgādivasena pajahanaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:4_3: Siddhe hi samucchedappahāne paṭippassaddhippahānaṁ siddhameva hotīti.
anya-e0104n11:5_0: Bhīmavegānupatitāti sakalaṁ lokaṁ bhindantena viya bhīmena bhayānakena vegena sahasā patitā.
anya-e0104n11:8_1: Saṁyojanesu pahīnesu sabbepi kilesā pahīnāyeva hontīti saṁyojanānaṁyeva gahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:8_3: na aññaṁ kiñci atthantaraṁ vipākabhūtanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n11:8_4: Tenāha “phalaṁ nāma na koci añño dhammo atthī”ti.
anya-e0104n11:8_9: mohakkhayo”ti suttapadassa atthaṁ aññathā gahetvā nippariyāyato “arahattaṁ nāma kiñci natthi,
anya-e0104n11:8_10: kilesappahānameva tathā voharīyatī”ti vadantā sesaphalepi paṭikkhipanti.
anya-e0104n11:8_15: Yā pana ariyamaggassa bhāvitattā labbhamānāpi yassā vipākapaññāya nippajjamānāya nippajjati,
anya-e0104n11:8_16: sā paṭippassaddhiyaṁ nipphādetabbāyaṁ paññāti paṭippassaddhipaññāti vuttā.
anya-e0104n11:8_17: Sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiyā vuṭṭhātīti sammādiṭṭhiyā ujuvipaccanīkadassanavasena vatvā tadaññatopi vuṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0104n11:8_23: tāya micchādiṭṭhiyā sampayuttakkhandhehi ceva tappaccayā āyatiṁ uppajjanakkhandhehi cāti attho.
anya-e0104n11:8_24: Bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehīti yathāvuttakilesakkhandhehi bahiddhābhūtehi vipassanāya gocarabhūtehi sabbasaṅkhāranimittehi.
anya-e0104n11:9_0: Evaṁ maggakiccaṁ dassetvā idāni tassa vasena phalaṁ dassetuṁ “tampayogapaṭippassaddhattā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:9_1: Tattha tampayogapaṭippassaddhattāti tassa ajjhattabahiddhā vuṭṭhānādipayogassa paṭippassaddhattā.
anya-e0104n11:9_3: pavattato ca vuṭṭhahanto kilese pajahatīti attano khaṇe taṁ payogaṁ karoti nāma,
anya-e0104n11:9_4: phalakkhaṇe panassa so payogo paṭippassaddho vūpasanto nāma hoti.
anya-e0104n11:9_6: Uppajjatīti maggānantaraṁ dvikkhattuṁ vā tikkhattuṁ vā uppajjati.
anya-e0104n11:9_10: Maggassetaṁ phalanti yathāvuttā vipākā sammādiṭṭhi nāma,
anya-e0104n11:10_1: ime dhammā appamāṇārammaṇāti appamāṇārammaṇatāya maggehi nibbisesatāya.
anya-e0104n11:10_2: Tathā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaṅkhāto mahaggato dhammo nirodhato vuṭṭhānavelāyaṁ appamāṇassa dhammassa
anya-e0104n11:10_3: anantarapaccayena paccayoti ariyaphalassa anantarapaccayatāya ca dīpanāti evamādīnipi ettha ariyaphalassa
anya-e0104n11:12_0: 859.Ariyaphalassa nirodhe appanāti ariyassa phalajhānassa nibbāne ārammaṇabhūte appanākārena pavatti.
anya-e0104n11:13_2: Ariyā sabbepi phalasamāpattiṁ samāpajjantīti kāmaṁ sāmaññajotanā,
anya-e0104n11:13_5: Uparimānampi heṭṭhimāya lokiyasamāpattiyā viya samāpajjanaṁ sādhentaṁ viya ṭhitanti taṁ nivattento “uparimā panā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n11:13_11: Etena uparimo ariyo heṭṭhimaṁ phalasamāpattiṁ samāpajjati attanā adhigatattā,
anya-e0104n11:13_14: Na hi lokiyajjhānesu puggalantarabhāvūpagamanaṁ nāma atthi visesābhāvato.
anya-e0104n11:13_15: Idha pana asamugghāṭitakammakilesanirodhanena puthujjanehi viya sotāpannassa,
anya-e0104n11:13_17: Yato heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā phaladhammā uparūpari maggadhammehi nivattitā paṭipakkhehi viya abhibhūtā appavattidhammataṁyeva āpannā.
anya-e0104n11:14_2: anantaraphalattā ca lokuttarakusalānaṁ heṭṭhimato uparimo bhavantaragato viya hoti.
anya-e0104n11:14_6: tena tena jhānena gahitapaṭisandhiko viyāti tassa tassa ariyassa taṁ taṁ phalaṁ bhavaṅgasadisanti na
anya-e0104n11:14_9: Heṭṭhimā ca uparimanti heṭṭhimā ca sotāpannādayo ariyā uparimaṁ sakadāgāmiphalādiṁ na samāpajjantīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n11:15_0: “Attano attanoyeva pana phalaṁ samāpajjantī”ti iminā sabbepi ariyā attano attano phalasamāpattiṁ samāpajjantīti
anya-e0104n11:15_1: atthe āpanne tattha kesañci matibhedaṁ dassetuṁ “keci panā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:15_2: Ete hi samādhismiṁ paripūrakārinoti yasmā hi te “uparimā dve”ti vuttā anāgāmino,
anya-e0104n11:15_6: Na hi samādhipāripūriyā vinā samāpattivaḷañjanaṁ sambhavatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n11:15_12: sabbaso asamucchinnakilesassa puthujjanassāpi attanā paṭiladdhalokiyasamāpattisamāpajjanaṁ labbhati,
anya-e0104n11:15_14: tasmā tesaṁ samādhismiṁ aparipūrakāritā attano phalasamāpattiṁ asamāpajjanassa akāraṇanti.
anya-e0104n11:15_16: ayaṁ panattho pāḷiāruḷhoti kāraṇāpadese anādarakaraṇamukhena pāḷiṁ dassento “kiñcetthā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n11:16_0: Ettha ca “suññatavihārasamāpattatthāya animittavihārasamāpattatthāyā”tiādinā sarūpato uddhaṭattā tato
anya-e0104n11:16_3: aniccānupassanāmukhena ca pavattānaṁ phalasamāpattīnaṁ purecarā gotrabhudhammā navadasabhāvena vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n11:16_4: “Sotāpattiphalasamāpattatthāyā”tiādinā pana catūsupi phalesu ekasadisaṁ desanāya āgatattā sotāpannasakadāgāminopi
anya-e0104n11:16_6: Maggānantaraphalavasena taṁ vuttanti ca na sakkā vattuṁ vipassanāvasena dasannaṁ gotrabhudhammānaṁ dassanavasena desanāya āraddhattā,
anya-e0104n11:16_8: Na ca maggānantaraṁ phalaṁ “phalasamāpattī”ti vuccati visuṁ parikammābhāvato.
anya-e0104n11:17_1: Payojanampi tadatthāya paṭipattiyā kāraṇaṁ hoti tannimittaṁ paṭipajjanatoti “kasmā samāpajjantī”ti kāraṇaṁ
anya-e0104n11:17_5: Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthanti diṭṭheva dhamme kilesadarathapariḷāhavūpasamena santena sukhavihārena viharaṇatthaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:17_6: Satipi vipākabhāve parikammena vinā anuppajjanato phalasamāpattidhammānaṁ tassa tassa ariyassa rucivaseneva pavatti,
anya-e0104n11:18_1: Yathā hi lokiyajjhānānaṁ samadhigamo sampayogasamaṅgibhāvena sijjhamāno pahānaṅgasamatikkamamukhena vuccati tathā samadhigantabbattā,
anya-e0104n11:18_2: evaṁ phalasamāpattipi nibbānamanasikārena sijjhamānā tadaññārammaṇāmanasikāramukhena vuccati sabbasaṅkhārato vinivaṭṭitamānasatāvasena samijjhanato.
anya-e0104n11:18_4: Udayabbayañāṇādiñāṇaparamparavasena hi sabbaphalacittaṁ saṅkhārato sabbaso nibbinnavirattacittassa tato vinissaṭanibbānārammaṇaṁ pavattati.
anya-e0104n11:18_5: Evaṁ pavattamānañca taṁ nibbānato aññassa ārammaṇassa amanasikārā,
anya-e0104n11:19_4: Amanasikāroti ādīnavato disvā vissaṭṭhatāya anāvajjanaṁ asamannāhāro.
anya-e0104n11:19_5: Animittāya ca dhātuyā manasikāroti sabbasaṅkhāranimittābhāvato animittāya.
anya-e0104n11:19_6: Kehici paccayehi na saṅkhatattā ca asaṅkhatāti laddhanāmāya asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā phalasamāpattisahajātena manasikārena manasikaraṇaṁ,
anya-e0104n11:20_0: 863.Udayabbayādivasenāti udayabbayabhaṅgabhayatupaṭṭhānādivasena pavattanakānaṁ navannampi ñāṇānaṁ byāpāraṁ vadati.
anya-e0104n11:20_3: Kasmā panettha gotrabhuñāṇaṁ maggañāṇapurecārikaṁ viya nibbānārammaṇaṁ na hotīti?
anya-e0104n11:20_8: Tasmā ekantena niyyānikasabhāvassa ubhatovuṭṭhānabhāvena pavattamānassa maggañāṇassa anantarapaccayabhūtena
anya-e0104n11:20_9: ñāṇena nimittato vuṭṭhiteneva bhavitabbanti tassa nibbānārammaṇatā yuttā,
anya-e0104n11:20_10: na pana ariyamaggassa bhāvitattā tassa vipākabhāvena pavattamānānaṁ kilesānaṁ asamucchindanato aniyyānikattā
anya-e0104n11:20_11: avuṭṭhānasabhāvānaṁ phalañāṇānaṁ purecārikañāṇassa kadācipi nibbānārammaṇatā ubhayattha anulomañāṇānaṁ
anya-e0104n11:20_13: Ariyamaggavīthiyañhi anulomañāṇāni anibbiddhapubbānaṁ thūlathūlalobhakkhandhādīnaṁ sātisayaṁ padālanena
anya-e0104n11:20_15: Phalasamāpattivīthiyaṁ pana tāni tena tena maggena tesaṁ tesaṁ kilesānaṁ samucchinnattā tattha kilesavikkhambhane
anya-e0104n11:20_16: nirussukkāni kevalaṁ ariyānaṁ phalasamāpattisukhasamaṅgibhāvassa parikammamattāni hutvā uppajjantīti
anya-e0104n11:20_18: yato nesaṁ pariyosānañāṇaṁ saṅkhāranimittavuṭṭhānato nibbānārammaṇaṁ siyā.
anya-e0104n11:21_0: Evañca katvā “sekkhassa attano phalasamāpattivaḷañjanatthāya udayabbayādivasena saṅkhāre sammasantassa vipassanāñāṇānupubbiyā phalameva uppajjati,
anya-e0104n11:21_1: na maggo”ti idañca aṭṭhakathāvacanaṁ samatthitaṁ hoti.
anya-e0104n11:21_4: Nibbānārammaṇe appanajjhānavasena yathāparicchinnakālaṁ nirantaraṁ phalacittasseva pavattanaṁ samāpajjanaṁ
anya-e0104n11:21_7: tena nīhārena sekkhassa uparimaggenāpi bhavitabbanti anuyogaṁ sandhāyāha “phalasamāpattininnatāyā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n11:21_14: Arahā paccekabuddho bhavissati yadi itaratthāpi vipassanā tadatthāya saṁvatteyyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n11:21_15: Pāḷivaseneva ca paṭikkhittanti “dasa gotrabhudhammā vipassanāvasena uppajjantī”ti maggatthā phalatthā
anya-e0104n11:21_16: vipassanā visuṁ katvā pavattapāḷivaseneva tesaṁ vacanaṁ paṭikkhittantipi na gahetabbaṁ,
anya-e0104n11:21_20: Jhānato sarikkhatādassaneneva cettha bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgavasenāpi sarikkhatā dassitāyevāti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:22_2: “Cande vā sūriye vā ettakaṁ ṭhānaṁ gate vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti kālāvadhiggahaṇavasena samāpajjanaṁ cittassa abhisaṅkharaṇaṁ abhisaṅkhāro.
anya-e0104n11:23_0: 865.Sabbānevetānīti rūpanimittādisabbāneva etāni ekato kāmaṁ na manasi karoti asambhavato.
anya-e0104n11:23_3: avayavabyatirekena ca samudāyo na labbhatīti avayavagatampi kiccaṁ samudāyavasena vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:23_5: Yasmā bhavaṅgacitte uppanne phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhito nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n11:23_8: Manasi karototi bhavaṅgasahagatena manasikārena manasi karoto,
anya-e0104n11:24_0: 866.Phalassa phalameva vā anantaraṁ hoti purimassa purimassa pacchimaṁ pacchimaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:24_4: “Yena phalena nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṁ hotī”ti idaṁ phaluppattiyā nirodhā vuṭṭhānabhāvato vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:24_5: Tanti nirodhāvuṭṭhānabhāvena vuttaṁ anāgāmiphalaṁ vā aggaphalaṁ vā.
anya-e0104n11:24_7: kiriyassa vā anantaraṁ satipi sattāhātikkame vijātiyena antarikattā.
anya-e0104n11:25_3: Taṇhāsaṅkhātaṁ lokāmisaṁ vantaṁ chaḍḍitaṁ etenāti vantalokāmisaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:25_6: Yena dhammena yogato samaṇo nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n11:27_0: Tassa ariyassa phalassa rasabhūtaṁ sārabhūtaṁ taṁ sukhaṁ paññaṁ bhāvetvā yasmā paṇḍito vindati paṭilabhatīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n11:30_0: 868.Anupubbanirodhavasenāti vipassanānugatā aṭṭha samāpattiyo ārohantena taṁtaṁpaṭipakkhanirodhamukhena tiṇṇaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ anupubbato nirodhavasena.
anya-e0104n11:30_4: ke na samāpajjantīti kāmaṁ samāpajjanasamatthā padhānatāya paṭhamaṁ pucchitā,
anya-e0104n11:30_5: tabbissajjanaṁ pana garubhāvato pacchā vissajjetuṁ asamāpajjanake tāva dassento “sabbepi…pe…
anya-e0104n11:30_9: Te hi aṭṭhannaṁ samāpattīnaṁ lābhinopi alābhino viya samādhismiṁ aparipūrakāritāya nirodhaṁ samāpajjituṁ na sakkonti.
anya-e0104n11:30_14: sukkhavipassakā ca arahantoti sukkhavipassakasaddo paccekaṁ yojetabbo.
anya-e0104n11:30_15: Ubhayepi cete satipi vipassanābale samādhibalassa abhāvato nirodhaṁ na samāpajjanti.
anya-e0104n11:30_17: Purimakā pana tayo satipi samādhibale vipassanābalassa abhāvato,
anya-e0104n11:30_19: Aparipuṇṇatā cassa saṅkhārānaṁ na sammā parimadditattā.
anya-e0104n11:30_21: samāpajjantī”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṁ pāḷivaseneva dassetuṁ “dvīhi balehī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:30_22: Tayo ca saṅkhārānanti ettha tayoti sāmiatthe paccattavacanaṁ,
anya-e0104n11:30_26: Ayañca sampadāti ayaṁ baladvayasamannāgamādikā yathāvuttanirodhasamāpattiāvahā sampatti.
anya-e0104n11:31_5: alobhapadhānassa vā tathāpavattakusalacittuppādassa vasena cittassa ekaggatāsaṅkhāto yo avikkhepo,
anya-e0104n11:31_9: Thinamiddhavikkhambhikāya vibhūtaṁ katvā manasikaraṇena upaṭṭhitaālokasaññāya vasena.
anya-e0104n11:31_11: Sakalamicchāvitakkavikkhambhanassa sikhāpattaānāpānassatisiddhapaṭinissaggānupassiassāsapassāsānaṁ vasena cittassa ekaggatāsaṅkhāto yo avikkhepo,
anya-e0104n11:32_0: Evaṁ upacārassa jhānassa vasena samathabalaṁ dassetvā idāni taṁ aṭṭhannaṁ samāpattīnaṁ vasena paṭipakkhehi
anya-e0104n11:32_6: Tathā hi kenaṭṭhena samathabalanti balaṭṭho pucchito.
anya-e0104n11:32_18: Tenetaṁ aṭṭhannampi samāpattīnaṁ sādhāraṇato kiccātisayadassanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:32_19: Idaṁ samathabalanti yāyaṁ nekkhammādivasena laddhāya cittekaggatāya nīvaraṇādīhi akampanīyatā,
anya-e0104n11:33_0: Idāni vipassanābalaṁ niddisanto yasmā vipassanā saṅkhepato sattahi anupassanāhi saṅgahitā,
anya-e0104n11:33_1: tasmā tato tato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya tāsaṁ vasena anupassanā kātabbā,
anya-e0104n11:33_2: tattakeneva cettha anupassanākiccaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ hotīti “aniccānupassanā vipassanābalaṁ…pe…
anya-e0104n11:33_3: paṭinissaggānupassanā vipassanābala”nti sarūpato dassetvā puna tā heṭṭhā vuttanayena visayavibhāgena dassetuṁ “rūpe aniccānupassanā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:33_4: Idhāpi paṭipakkhehi anabhibhavanīyatāva balaṭṭhoti dassetuṁ “kenaṭṭhena vipassanābala”ntiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:33_9: Tenetaṁ sattannampi anupassanānaṁ sādhāraṇato kiccātisayadassanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:33_10: Idaṁ vipassanābalanti yāyaṁ aniccānupassanādivasena laddhassa vipassanāñāṇassa niccasaññādinimittaṁ akampanīyatā,
anya-e0104n11:34_0: Vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhārā vācaṁ saṅkharonti pavattentīti katvā.
anya-e0104n11:34_5: Te pana dutiyajjhāne vūpasantā hontīti āha “dutiyajjhānaṁ…pe…
anya-e0104n11:34_13: Te pana yasmā catutthajjhāne vūpasantā honti,
anya-e0104n11:34_18: Tathā hi vuttaṁ “saññā ca vedanā ca cetasikā ete dhammā cittappaṭibaddhā,
anya-e0104n11:34_19: tasmā saññā ca vedanā ca cittasaṅkhāro”ti.
anya-e0104n11:34_20: Te pana yasmā nirodhaṁ samāpannassa vūpasamanti,
anya-e0104n11:35_0: Ñāṇacariyāsu vivaṭṭānupassanāggahaṇeneva tassa ādibhūtā sesānupassanāpi gahitāva honti tadavinābhāvato.
anya-e0104n11:35_2: phalasamāpatti ñāṇacariyāti maggaphalasamāpattīnaṁ ñāṇacariyābhāvavacanaṁ maggaphaladhammānaṁ ñāṇapadhānattā,
anya-e0104n11:35_3: ñāṇena vā indriyādhipatihetumaggapaccayādivasena sātisayapaccayabhūtena sesā maggaphaladhammā caritā pavattitāti katvā tathā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:35_6: aṭṭhannañca maggaphalañāṇānaṁ vasena imāhi soḷasahi ñāṇapavattīhi.
anya-e0104n11:36_0: Navahi samādhicariyāhīti aṭṭha samāpattiyo aṭṭha samādhicariyā,
anya-e0104n11:36_1: tāsaṁ upacārasamādhi upacārasamādhibhāvanāsāmaññena ekā samādhicariyāti evaṁ navahi samādhicariyāhi.
anya-e0104n11:36_3: Paṭhamajjhānapaṭilābhatthāya vitakko cātiādi nānāvajjanupacāravasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0104n11:36_5: Na hi ekāvajjane catutthajjhānādiupacāre pītiādayo sambhavanti.
anya-e0104n11:36_6: Ettha ca “paṭhamajjhānapaṭilābhatthāyā”tiādivacanena upacārasamādhissāpi pāripūrī icchitabbāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n11:36_9: Yathā samathabalepi “nekkhammavasenā”tiādinā upacārasamādhinā saddhiṁ aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu appanāsamādhiyeva vutto,
anya-e0104n11:36_13: vivaṭṭānupassanā pana purecarañāṇādivipassanābale avuttā eva ñāṇacariyāsu vuttā.
anya-e0104n11:37_0: Vasībhāvatā paññāti ettha vaso etassa atthīti vasī,
anya-e0104n11:37_3: “Vasiyo”ti pana pāḷiyaṁ itthiliṅgavasena vuttattā tāyo dassetuṁ “vasīti pañca vasiyo”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:37_4: Tattha jhānaṁ āvajjantassa nirantaraṁ jhānaṅgesu cittappavattanasamatthatā āvajjanavasī.
anya-e0104n11:37_6: Accharāmattaṁ vā katipayaccharāmattaṁ vā khaṇaṁ jhānaṁ ṭhapetuṁ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī.
anya-e0104n11:37_13: Ñāṇacariyāsu pana lokuttarānaṁ ñāṇacariyānaṁ vasībhāvāpādanakiccaṁ nāma natthi.
anya-e0104n11:38_2: Yadi evanti yadi ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena “soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhī”ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0104n11:38_4: evaṁ sante kiṁ na hoti nirodhasamāpajjananti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n11:38_5: Pañca kāmaguṇā vatthubhūtā etassa santīti pañcakāmaguṇiko, kāmarāgo.
anya-e0104n11:38_7: Na hi kāmarāgassa vikkhambhanappahānamattaṁ nirodhassa adhiṭṭhānaṁ bhavituṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0104n11:38_9: Etena kāmaṁ maggaphalañāṇacariyā lokiyañāṇasamādhicariyā viya nirodhasamāpajjane sarūpena na viniyujjanti tadā appavattanato,
anya-e0104n11:38_10: tassa tassa pana paṭipakkhassa samucchindanena balacariyānaṁ visesapaccayatāya nirodhasamāpattiyā adhiṭṭhānaṁ hotīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n11:38_12: Idañhi “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassā”tiādivacanaṁ anāgāminova nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ “nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakusala”nti vacanato,
anya-e0104n11:39_1: nanu catuvokārabhavepi arūpajjhānavasena yathārahaṁ anupubbasamāpatti labbhatīti?
anya-e0104n11:39_4: Aṭṭhasamāpattivaseneva ca “anupubbasamāpattī”ti vuccatīti dassento āha “paṭhamajjhānādīnaṁ uppatti natthī”ti.
anya-e0104n11:39_9: aññassa ca kassaci abhāvato apaññattikova bhaveyya anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutasadiso.
anya-e0104n11:40_2: tesaṁ vā kusalādibhedabhinne yathārahaṁ tīhi dukkhatāhi upaddute pavattivibhāge.
anya-e0104n11:40_3: Cittacetasikavigamehi rūpadhammesu labbhamānāpi saṅkhāradukkhatā abbohārikataṁ āpajjati.
anya-e0104n11:41_4: Aññassa kassacipi cittassa anuppajjanena evamassā nirodhasamāpattiyā samāpajjanaṁ hoti.
anya-e0104n11:41_6: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṁ patvā tiṭṭhati taduddhaṁ suddhasamathavipassanāya abhāvato.
anya-e0104n11:41_7: Yo vipassanāvaseneva ussakkati sace ariyo phalasamāpattatthiko,
anya-e0104n11:41_10: sekho vā maggatthiko tāya ce vipassanāya maggaṁ patvā phale ṭhito,
anya-e0104n11:42_1: Yena phaladvayasamannāgamādinā nirodhaṁ samāpajjituṁ samattho hoti,
anya-e0104n11:42_2: so vidhi pageva vibhāvitoti samāpajjanākārameva dassento “katabhattakicco”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n11:43_1: kīdisī panettha vipassanā icchitabbāti taṁ niddhāraṇatthaṁ “vipassanā panesā”tiādinā tameva vipassanaṁ tidhā bhinditvā dasseti.
anya-e0104n11:43_6: Lakkhaṇappattā pana vipassanā maggassa paccayo hotiyevāti imamatthaṁ dassento āha “saṅkhāra…pe…
anya-e0104n11:43_8: Tikkhāva vaṭṭati saṅkhārārammaṇepi sati sabbasaṅkhārehi vivaṭṭanākāreneva pavattanato,
anya-e0104n11:43_9: maggo viya visaṅkhāragatassa phalassa paccayabhāvato ca.
anya-e0104n11:43_11: Yasmā atimandā samathādikā saṅkhārānaṁ nirodhane asamatthā samathaniṭṭhā hoti,
anya-e0104n11:43_12: atitikkhā ñāṇādikā sātisayaṁ saṅkhāresu dosadassane phalasamāpattiniṭṭhā hoti,
anya-e0104n11:44_2: “Ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre tatheva vipassatī”ti vattabbaṁ,
anya-e0104n11:44_3: heṭṭhā vuttanayattā pana taṁ avatvā “catubbidhaṁ pubbakiccaṁ karoti”cceva vuttanti keci,
anya-e0104n11:44_7: Tathā hi paratopi “ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya imaṁ pubbakiccaṁ katvā”tiādiṁ vakkhati,
anya-e0104n11:45_0: 875.Adhiṭṭhātabbanti cittaṁ uppādetabbaṁ. Tathā cittuppādanameva hettha adhiṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:46_1: pacchājātapaccayādiupatthambhābhāvato ca sattāhameva tathā sarīraṁ pavattati,
anya-e0104n11:46_2: tato paraṁ kilamatīti sattāhameva paricchinditvā nirodhaṁ samāpajjantīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n11:47_1: Naṁ aggiādiantarāyaṁ rakkhati samāpannako adhiṭṭhānavasenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n11:48_2: Tasmiṁ samayeti tasmiṁ tassa bhikkhuno upasaṅkamanasamaye vuṭṭhātiyeva.
anya-e0104n11:49_0: Evaṁ garukāti aggiādīhipi anabhibhavanīyaṁ nirodhaṁ samāpannaṁ samāpattito vuṭṭhāpanato evaṁ garukā hi saṅghassa āṇā nāma,
anya-e0104n11:49_1: tasmā attano hitasukhaṁ ākaṅkhantena jīvitahetupi saṅghassa āṇā na atikkamitabbāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n11:50_0: 877.Na pakkosati “satthā taṁ, āvuso, āmantetī”ti. “Vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti āvajjitabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0104n11:52_1: Kiñcāpi “ekaṁ vā dve vā”ti aniyametvā viya vuttaṁ,
anya-e0104n11:52_2: dve vāre eva pana niyamato vadanti.
anya-e0104n11:52_8: ñāṇasamādhicariyāvasībhāvo cettha aññamaññānativattanavaseneva icchitabboti āha “dve samathavipassanādhamme yuganaddhe katvā”ti.
anya-e0104n11:52_11: Idaṁ vuttanayena aṭṭhasamāpattiārohanaṁ na nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā samāpajjanassa.
anya-e0104n11:52_12: Tasmā dvinnaṁ cittānaṁ upari cittāni na pavattantīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n11:53_0: Paratoacittako bhavituṁ na sakkotīti sakalaṁ yathāparicchinnakālaṁ acittako bhavituṁ na sakkoti.
anya-e0104n11:53_3: Tassa hi akaraṇena kadāci kevalaṁ tādisassa parikkhārassa avināso na siyā,
anya-e0104n11:53_6: Evaṁ sante tīhi ākārehi nirodhasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṁ hotīti āpajjati,
anya-e0104n11:53_8: Paṭinivattitvā puna ākiñcaññāyataneyeva patiṭṭhātīti iminā samāpattiyā vibandhe jāte evaṁ hotīti dasseti,
anya-e0104n11:53_9: avibandheneva pana yathāparicchinnakālavītikkamane phalacittuppattiyā vuṭṭhānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0104n11:53_10: Evañca katvā gambhīrakandaroruḷhatattapāsāṇakkantapurisanidassanampi samatthitaṁ hotīti keci vadanti.
anya-e0104n11:53_11: Apare pana “pubbakiccassa akatattā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samāpannamattova ‘paṭinivattitvā ākiñcaññāyatane
anya-e0104n11:53_19: “Ākiñcaññāyatane patiṭṭhātī”ti ca idaṁ puna ākiñcaññāyatanassa samāpajjitabbattā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:57_2: avasesacetasikaviññāṇābhāvena rūpadhammamattāvasesatāya ca matanirodhasamāpannānaṁ avisesaṁ gahetvā pucchā “matassa ca samāpannassa ca ko viseso”ti.
anya-e0104n11:57_4: rūpadhammamattāvasesatāya pana āyuusmāindriyānaṁ apagamānapagamanaṁ visesoti dassetuṁ “yvāya”ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:58_2: Paramatthato hi vijjamānānaṁ saṅkhatādibhāvena vattabbataṁ labhati,
anya-e0104n11:58_4: Samāpajjantassa vasenāti yasmā samāpajjantassa ariyapuggalassa samathavipassanādhamme yuganaddhe katvā
anya-e0104n11:58_5: aṭṭha samāpattiyo ārohantassa anukkamena saṅkhārānaṁ paṭippassambhanapayoganibbattiyā nirodhasamāpatti
anya-e0104n11:58_7: tasmā taṁ payoganibbattiṁ upādāya “nipphannā”ti vattuṁ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0104n11:59_3: Tissannampi dukkhatānaṁ nibbutabhāvato nibbānamiti saṅkhaṁ upāgataṁ.
anya-e0104n11:61_11: Anuttaraṁ uttamaṁ sattānaṁ puññaviruhanaṭṭhānanti anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassāti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
anya-e0104n11:62_0: 886.Mandāyavipassanāya āgatoti atikkhāya vipassanāya vasena paṭhamamaggapaññaṁ bhāvetvā sotāpannabhāvaṁ āgato.
anya-e0104n11:62_1: Saddhādīnaṁ mudūnaṁ indriyānaṁ vasena mudindriyopi samāno.
anya-e0104n11:62_3: tato paraṁ aṭṭhamaṁ bhavaṁ nādiyatīti sattakkhattuparamo.
anya-e0104n11:62_5: Dukkhassantaṁ karotīti vaṭṭadukkhassa pariyantaṁ pariyosānaṁ karoti.
anya-e0104n11:62_7: kālena manussalokassāti missakassa bhavassa vasena “sattasugatibhave saṁsaritvā”ti vutto.
anya-e0104n11:62_9: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyato paṭṭhāya hi nīcakule upapatti nāma natthi,
anya-e0104n11:62_11: Dve vā tīṇi vā kulānīti devamanussavasena dve vā tayo vā bhave.
anya-e0104n11:62_15: Attabhāvaggahaṇasaṅkhātaṁ ekaṁyeva khandhabījaṁ etassa atthīti ekabījī.
anya-e0104n11:62_20: Sace hi upari tiṇṇaṁ maggānaṁ vipassanā balavatī hoti,
anya-e0104n11:63_3: “Imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā”ti iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekova gahito.
anya-e0104n11:63_4: Ekacco hi idha sakadāgāmiphalaṁ patvā idheva parinibbāti,
anya-e0104n11:63_9: Yo pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṁ vasitvā puna idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāti,
anya-e0104n11:64_3: Pañcadhā idha vihāya niṭṭho hotīti so anāgāmī antarāparinibbāyiādibhāvena pañcapakārena imaṁ lokaṁ pajahitvā parinibbāyanako hoti.
anya-e0104n11:64_6: Appayogenāti adhimattapayogena vinā appakasireneva tikkhindriyatāya sukheneva.
anya-e0104n11:64_8: Uddhaṁ vā hi bhāvena uddhamassa taṇhāsotaṁ,
anya-e0104n11:64_10: Uddhaṁ vā gantvā paṭilabhitabbato uddhamassa maggasotanti uddhaṁsoto.
anya-e0104n11:65_1: Imesaṁ pana anāgāmīnaṁ pabhedajānanatthaṁ uddhaṁsotaakaniṭṭhagāmicatukkaṁ veditabbaṁ –
anya-e0104n11:65_2: yo hi avihato paṭṭhāya cattāro devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhaṁ gantvā parinibbāti,
anya-e0104n11:65_4: Yo pana heṭṭhā tayo devaloke sodhetvā sudassīdevaloke ṭhatvā parinibbāti,
anya-e0104n11:65_8: Yo pana heṭṭhā catūsu devalokesu tattha tattheva parinibbāti,
anya-e0104n11:65_10: Ete pana avihesu upapannasamanantarā āyuvemajjhaṁ appatvā,
anya-e0104n11:68_10: Lokiyavijjābhiññāhi vināpi ubhatobhāgavimuttatā hotīti ubhatobhāgavimutto visuṁ gahito.
anya-e0104n11:68_11: Yaṁ sandhāya vuttanti yaṁ catutthamaggapaññābhāvanaṁ sandhāya heṭṭhā saṅkhepato gāthāvaṇṇanāyaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0104n11:68_12: taṁ pana vuttākāraṁ nigamanavasena dassetuṁ “maggakkhaṇe”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n11:68_13: Kāmaṁ catūsupi maggakkhaṇesu taṁ jaṭaṁ vijaṭeti nāma,
anya-e0104n11:68_17: Tenettha heṭṭhā heṭṭhimamaggapaññābhāvanānisaṁsassa vuttattāva catutthamaggapaññābhāvanāvasena attho vutto.
anya-e0104n11:69_0: Ratinti abhiratiṁ, abhirucinti attho. Tatthāti ariyāya paññābhāvanāya.
anya-e0104n11:70_1: Gāthā hi attano atthabhūtassa visuddhimaggassa ādhārabhāvena vuttā,
anya-e0104n11:74_0: 891.Imissādāni gāthāyātiādīnaṁ gāthānaṁ attho heṭṭhā vutto eva.
anya-e0104n11:74_1: Svāyaṁ “visuddhimaggaṁ bhāsissa”nti evaṁ paṭiññāto visuddhimaggo ettāvatā bhāsito hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n11:75_1: tesaṁ “sīle patiṭṭhāyā”tigāthāyaṁ vuttānaṁ sīlādippabhedānaṁ atthānaṁ pañcannampi mahānikāyānaṁ aṭṭhakathānaye
anya-e0104n11:75_2: aṭṭhakathātantiyaṁ tattha tattha vutto yo vinicchayo,
anya-e0104n11:75_3: yebhuyyena taṁ sabbaṁ samāharitvā samānetvā nikāyantarassa nikāyagatavādadosasaṅkarehi mutto so nicchayo yasmā pakāsito,
anya-e0104n11:75_4: tasmā visuddhikāmehi yogīhi etasmiṁ visuddhimagge ādaro karaṇīyoyevāti.
anya-e0104n11:86_0: Sā esā paramatthānaṁ, tattha tattha yathārahaṁ;
anya-e0104n11:90_0: Iti taṁ saṅkharontena, yaṁ taṁ adhigataṁ mayā;
anya-e0104n11:95_0: Tasmiṁ sagāravā niccaṁ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino.
anya-e0104n11:96_0: Sammā vassatu kālena, devo rājā mahīpati;
